page.title: 09Religion
page.content:
St Peter's Church,Deene, is redundant, and services are celebrated in Deene Hall chapel. The Rev.Timothy Withers Green,Rector of Weldon(2 miles south), conducts the services...and in the past year has officiated at 2 baptisms, one marriage and a funeral. The Rector takes Communion monthly to the sick and housebound,and is at present preparing a farmer's son and an estate worker for Confirmation.
On 22nd June this year (St Petertide) a concert was held in the church, with an audience of 200 listening to Kettering Chamber Orchestra and Choir.On the Sunday(23rd June) the Assistant Bishop of the diocese,Right Rev.William Franklin preached in St Peter's to a congregation drawn from surrounding villages.
